name: PhysicsMassProperties
desc: Mass properties of a physics body.

items.name: static let `default`: PhysicsMassProperties
items.desc: The default mass properties, equivalent to a unit sphere with a mass of 1 kilogram.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a mass properties instance with default settings.

items.name: init(mass: Float, inertia: SIMD3<Float>, centerOfMass: (position: SIMD3<Float>, orientation: simd_quatf))
items.desc: Creates a mass properties instance with the given settings.

items.name: init(shape: ShapeResource, density: Float)
items.desc: Creates the mass properties for a solid shape with the specified density.

items.name: init(shape: ShapeResource, mass: Float)
items.desc: Creates the mass properties for a solid shape with the specified mass.

items.name: var inertia: SIMD3<Float>
items.desc: The inertia in kilograms per square meter.

items.name: var centerOfMass: (position: SIMD3<Float>, orientation: simd_quatf)
items.desc: The position of the center of mass and the orientation of the principal axes.

items.name: static func == (PhysicsMassProperties, PhysicsMassProperties) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two physics mass properties are equal.

items.name: static func != (PhysicsMassProperties, PhysicsMassProperties) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two physics mass properties are not equal.
